body:
Do you have any suggestion of a safe website I can get the plugin world edit?
And how can I put it in minecraft?
Thank you :)
body_tagged:

title: Where can I get world edit?

replies.body:
Here ya go, Download liteloader then world edit wrapper:

http://www.minecraftforum.net/forums/mapping-and-modding/minecraft-mods/1294341-worldeditwrapper-use...
^-^
